originalText.text: Adam's amazing. Truly cares for his patients well beings and goes the extra mile to make sure you have all the information

text.text: Adam's amazing. Truly cares for his patients well beings and goes the extra mile to make sure you have all the information

originalText.text:
Dr. Rosenbluth is extremely knowledgeable, professional, articulate, caring & sensitive to patient concerns. He puts patients quickly at ease & takes the time to assess matters thoroughly &  competently.  My husband has just relocated to this country & was quite concerned about being able to acquire the best medications to treat his heart-related conditions. He arrived at Dr. Rosenbluth's office with considerable skepticism about the medication issues being resolved.  But, the doctor quickly overcame his doubts & worked with him to fully understand his situation, find comparable medications, make adjustments based on his history, etc.

After an hour with Dr. Rosenbluth, he was pleased with the decisions & very grateful for the doctor's resolution of all the issues in his case. That the doctor was able to give him peace of mind & confidence so early in his residency in this country made me incredibly grateful.  I have seen the doctor in the past for testing procedures & he was just as thorough & sensitive then. He even accommodated a scheduling problem I had by seeing me at a time outside his  office hours.

I would recommend Dr. Rosenbluth to anyone with any type of cardiac care need. He is a fine person & an excellent physician, truly one of the best!

originalText.text: Dr. Adam Rosenbluth truly cares about his patient's health and practices with the highest level of care and professionalism.

text.text: Dr. Adam Rosenbluth truly cares about his patient's health and practices with the highest level of care and professionalism.

originalText.text: What can I say about a doctor who has saved my life?  After a dermatologist missed a suspicious skin discoloration, Dr. Rosenbluth suggested I have it checked further.  Without providing a lot of detail except to say it was a malignant melanoma and it was caught in time.  Dr. Rosenbluth is professional, talented and caring.  I'd give more than 5 stars if possible.
